{"command":"python - << 'PY'
from pathlib import Path
p=Path('reproduce_issue.py')
s=p.read_text()
s=s.replace("class FakeBuffer:\n    def __init__(self, mode):\n        self.mode = mode\n        self.written = []\n    def write(self, obj):\n        # This fake buffer only accepts str, raises if bytes provided\n        if isinstance(obj, str):\n            raise TypeError(\"underlying buffer expects bytes, not str\")\n        self.written.append(obj)\n    def __repr__(self):\n        return '<FakeBuffer mode=%r>' % (self.mode,)",
"class FakeBuffer:\n    def __init__(self, mode):\n        # mode includes 'b' to simulate an underlying binary buffer\n        self.mode = mode\n        self.written = []\n\n    def write(self, obj):\n        # underlying buffer expects text (str); writing bytes should raise\n        if isinstance(obj, bytes):\n            raise TypeError(\"underlying buffer expects str, not bytes\")\n        self.written.append(obj)\n\n    def __repr__(self):\n        return '<FakeBuffer mode=%r>' % (self.mode,)")

p.write_text(s)
print('patched')
PY","timeout":120000,"security_risk":"LOW"}
